content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were coming home from my job delivering the local paper just after midnight on new years day. we hadn't had anything to drink but diet coke. (later i had a single beer). as we pulled onto wynngate dr. we noticed fireworks from the next street over to the west. my wife needed to use the bathroom, so i let her go ahead into the house while i watched the fireworks. just as i exited the car, which was pointed almost directly east, there was a loud boom. as i came to the back of the car, i noticed some lights approaching from the nw. the fireworks did not continue, but the lights drew my attention. a set of 3 light were moving in a straight line. they were moving with the short end of the triangle leading. i thought at first someone was playing with chinese lanterns. i changed my mind almost instantly and figured they were drones. but as there was a little wind that morning and the lights were not having trouble staying in formation, i didn't know what was going on. the lights sort of pulsed on about a 1 or 2 second schedule. they were an orange color, about the same as the stop hand signal at crosswalks. the lights stopped at about dead west from my position. as i watched them i realised what i was seeing was not natural. i started taking pictures with my phone, but only got the last 2 lights. then another set of lights became visible thru the trees to the west. there were 3 lights, again in a triangle with the short end leading. i looked at the first set and watched as they appeared to  begin to rotate on their axis. as the nearer light passed light on its right, it began to fade, it was gone in about 2 or 3 seconds. the other lights in that formation also faded away. the other set of light stopped slightly to the north of west and after about another minute, they also faded out. 
i went into the house, told my wife what i'd seen had a beer and went to bed.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 sets of lights in triangular formation. 1 following the other. both moving backwards.

content.detailedDescription:
On 1/1/2016 we were outside and saw a craft come from the west.  it flew over our house.  it was about 200 feet in the air.  it was triangular in shape, it glowed a yellow color and had white lights on the corners (3). 

about a minute later we observed 2 more crafts come from the west flying in tandem.  they flew over the house and headed toward the direction of the other craft.  

about a minute later a forth craft came from the west flew over the house and flew toward the other three crafts.  

we watched the four crafts fly into the atmosphere gaining speed as they reached the indian river where they ascended into the sky and disappeared. 

the crafts were a glowing yellow cover with white lights at the 3 corners.

they emitted a red glow from the bottom of the crafts.  when they were several miles away the red glow seemed to get larger from underneath the crafts and it looked as though it exploded before they disappeared from our view into the atmosphere.

a friend said he saw flying objects a few days before in the same area and field investigator stacey jones came with him to talk to us on 1/3/2016. we tried to upload the pictures and videos of the sighting to stacey and it failed.  she came back 1/5/2016 and now has the pictures and videos.
content.summary: Saw 4 triangular crafts coming from the west.  they flew over the house and then flew out into space.

content.detailedDescription:
Making tea after movie
huge light in sky where normally is nothing
clearly unknown object untill took out digital camera
hovered glowing for over one hour then dissappeared, can see inner structure also another ring around the object was giving off a lot of light can be seen from surrounding clouds
very interested 
object just dissappeared
content.summary: Hovered glowing for over one hour then dissappeared, can see inner structure also another ring around the object was giving off a lot of light can be seen from surrounding clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was playing computer games during the time of the event. the lights got my attention because they were pulsating, amber-red-orange colored and unlike a typical fishing boat or party boat that would be seen on the water. i have seen multiple sightings as noted in the ufo reporting center reports (2013-2015). 

description and date of incident: the photo was taken on, january 6, 2016, between the hours of 2-3am eastern standard time.  location:  the ocean horizon of carolina beach, north carolina, in front of the boardwalk.  the red-amber colored lights blinked off and on all night long until the sun came up.  note:  this picture was taken on a tripod, as well as, time exposed due to nighttime visibility.  i tried using a cell phone but it would not work because it was too dark.
i can rule out any identifiable structures (boat/other) related to the lights seen.  i'm not sure what this is?  the lights appeared separated but together (no identifiable structure associated with it).  the lights followed a sequencing of left to right and then right to left repeatedly until the sun came up.  

feelings:  i have had prior sightings of these orange colored lights and every time i see them its like a surprise, but at the same time, i feel like i want to know what this is!  i kept saying to myself, "what the heck is this?"  what in the world are these things doing out here and why?  curiosity mixed with excitement.  as i am writing this i want to know why and for what reason.
content.summary: Reddish-orange lights, plusating sequentially, 1 degree above the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home with my girlfriend at about 830 pm on elmer hill road in rome ny. when i saw what looked like and extremely low flying plane flying above the tree tops. it had 3 white lights on it and one red light underneath. when we got closer, we realized it was not flying but hovering. it literally turned towards us in the air and flew/hovered directly above us. it made absolutely no sound and turned on a dime. it was the size of a normal jet, but was flat rectangular/diamond shape with a dome on top. i only could see that because the ufo literally flew right above us. it was a pretty scary experience, and completely real. i've never seen anything like it and was completely amazed.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo flies in front and over car.

content.detailedDescription: 3 reports done in a local newspaper of a 12 foot man.
content.summary: 12 foot man. 3 reports in local newspaper in 3 days reported to police

content.detailedDescription: i was with my older sister driving towards bellefonte, pa. we were going to pick up my other sister from after school activity. we went around a turn at the outskirts of axeman on state route 144 about 1.5 miles outside of bellefonte. we drove up to 2 other cars that were stopped on the road. 4 or 5 people were out looking at the ufo. we got out and watched it for around a minute or so. i thought that it looked like a mercury space capsule with lights. the object was just over the tree line right in front of us. it was bell shaped tilted to the left. it was spinning very fast. the bottom had a row of white to yellow lights. the top had red,blue,yellow,and green lights. it hovered for awhile then it did a zig zag movement and shot out in a western direction. it moved at speeds that did not exist in any airplane book i read. i did not talk to the other people that were there nor did i know them. i did remember that it looked funny with the others could not take their eyes off of it. 20 years later i was talking about this incident with my sister who is 12 years my elder, and she said i was lying, it did not happen, i did not see anything. i was 10 years old.
content.summary: I saw a bell shaped object with white,yellow,blue,green,and red lights hovering and then shot off.

content.detailedDescription: My friend take some photo but at time he not detect something unusual behind the horizon. when he returned home to show me pictures and spot the ufo (sorry, i speed english not well)
content.summary: My friend take some photo but at time he not detect something unusual behind the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Jan 5 2016 really slowit was far away but saw blinking red blue green lites then in 2015around sept 900 at nightcoming back from paulding on st rt 613 there was a flying saucer hovering along side the higway about the size of a football feild saw windows all the way around it each window blinked red blue an green it  looked so close that we we could reach up an touch it saw it there same spot tow differant nights we will never for get that there fliy out at our place all the timeiv got huge binockulars but but i did not have my caamcoreder with me but i pray that some one will check it out you will really be suprisedim a disabled vet an i no how these things get covered up ok describe our feelings felt lik we were being watchedlooking at it there was no soundwe sat there about 15 min looking at it then told my wife we drive a dodge heim very fast truck told her to floor it to get my camcored but it took off to floowing us then it went above grover hillan stayed there then we went home .
content.summary: Blinking redblue green lights moved really slow

content.detailedDescription:
i routinely walk my dog here in the park where i live in folsom, california in the evening between 9 and 10 pm. there was a break in the rain, so i took him out about 9:15 pm, arriving back at my driveway at 9:25 pm. flashing/pulsating lights above caught my attention, and i looked up in awe. the lights pulsated  approximately every one second from one color to another to another: purples, reds, blues, greens, yellow, and white flashing seemingly randomly, as i could not detect a precise sequence.
 i watched without taking my eyes off the spectacular light show, wishing i had my cell phone with me so i could photograph and take a video; alas, my phone was in the house and i ultimately decided to run in and get it. however, when i returned, the ufo was gone. 
(i had intended to call my nearest neighbors to come out and watch it with me…)
 the lights were directly over my head; i'm guessing that far up in the sky they must've been 3 to 500 feet long, in a straight line. beyond the color, there appeared to be an extremely long tail that looked black in the night sky, extending hundreds of feet, or perhaps a mile (very difficult to estimate distance like that).
content.summary: turning in to my driveway after walking my dog, flashing lights in the sky caught my attention. i had to crane my neck to watch them.

content.detailedDescription: My wife came to get me to see a star like u.F.O. that moved verry fast verry high. seemed to multiply or break up then back again. planes were in site some of the time and these things were way higher.The thing would dart one wa at impossible speed,then circle,then dart again. i was in awe and excited to see what i wouldn't believe if you told me. color was same as stars near it. shape unknown. but at times it seemed to be a triangle because at times there were three lights. then back to one.Then would jump and seem to break up or shoot out white lights that were exactly same size as original light.When i first saw it i thought it was a star... then it moved. fast. far. this went on for more than ten minutes. it seemed to be moving away as it danced and moved because it ,they became dimmer.I was getting ready to eat dinner when my wife came for me. the speed this thing must have been going to cover that much space that far up... wow.While we were watching this, planes that were high up as they go were way under this,these crazy lights. no blinking marker lights. this was no plane. no comet. no shooting star. not the iss. this is by definition a u.F.O. or multiple u.F.O... we starter our report to you as soon as we lost site of this so things ate fresh in our minds. i have always wondered if the ufo thing was real. now i know it is. my hope is that you will receive many reports by many people in our area. i would be happy to speak to anyone from mufon to clarify any details. no alcohol or drugs were taken.My cousin elizabeth nichols took many pictures but we are not sure if anything can be seen on them. it is a good digital camera. we are hoping to have real evidence to send you.
content.summary: Darting in crazy ways, verry high up. seemed to break up or shoot out orbs same size. fast!

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were smoking before she went home, and she noticed the erratically moving object. so we kept watching, and it made a zig zag movements, then hovered in a star free area. during this time it moved vaguely circular pattern. while doing this it appeared objects left and were absorbed by the "star". it then continued its erratic movements, fading in brightness, then getting brighter again. as we were wrapping up our watching session, i observed three more erratic "stars" that appeared to be following the first "star". at the same time my husband observed yet another "star" when we couldn't see any more erratic activity we went inside.
content.summary: Star like object circling in erratic fashion around stationary star

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I remember the weather being a clear hot summer night in july 1992 it was a tuesday night about 9:00pm. i was at a friends place. he lived on the top floor, floor 16 of an apartment building facing south west towards the lake. we noticed the passenger jets over the lake from time to time circling to land at the airport. we noticed one light out over the lake that seem to not be moving at all for a long length of time. it looked like one bright white yellowish light. after some time that same light while staying in position turned into 3 lights in the shape of a triangle. the triangle looked dark black with 1 light at each corner that had a dull but bright white yellowish light. south of the apartment building by the lake there used to be a large coal burning power plant. the triangle eventually started moving with no sound following the power lines to and around the station. it disappeared after 10 to 15 minutes of following directly above the lines. minutes later the triangle re appeared 50 foot or less ascending from below us on the 16th floor slowly then it stopped in front of my friend and i. it made no sound, there was no wind. it almost seemed like everything around us stopped at the time. i remember my friend took a few steps forward and put his hand out as if to try and touch it. i remember yelling no don't and that point the triangle let off a very intense bright blinding light. we both screamed in fear and ducked down to the ground in a ball like position. after getting up and realizing it was gone we ran inside. both his parents were home at the time inside. we were both panicked. we briefly told his parents what happened. they never saw any light or even heard us scream i remember them saying. 
years went by my friend never spoke about it again until last year after his father passed away. he looked at me and recounted what we saw. he said it still scares him so he doesn't talk about it to anyone. my self on the other hand felt the urge to tell people from time to time.
some friends and parents about what i had seen. of course i don't know what i saw most people just think your crazy or a liar. but i know what i had seen. i still remember like it was yesterday  

a few days after this event took place. i was riding my bicycle home from a friends house down the street from where i lived. i looked up it was about 10:30 pm clear night also. and i saw a red orb looking object following me down the street just above the tree line. it looked like lava or fire but it was round smaller in size maybe the size or a small car or a large beach ball maybe and it made no sound at all. i kept pedaling as fast as i could to get home. i told my parents also about what i had seen. my self at the time only being 12 years old. a week later floating over the trees near the time of sun set i noticed the same looking orb floating over the tree line over our house and street. i yelled for my parents to come see it. as soon as my dad came out to see the object it quickly moved away from us quickly to the west and disappeared behind the tree line. my dad saw it moving away he said to me. he couldn't tell what it was. he only saw it for a second or 2. once again this orb made no sound.

thanks for  your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 different sightings over a 1 to 2 week time span. the first a very up close black triangle with 3 lights in the corners got as close as 50 feet or less. the other 2 lava or fire looking orbs red in colour just above the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon hq. with witness on the phone, by field investigator l. flechtner on 1/5/2016
------------------------------------------------------------------------
we, a crew of 8 to 10 men, were in the woods sw of monroe working a seismic survey crew, when at dusk a hugh, dark, boomerang shaped craft flew over us.
we were deep in the woods outside monroe, setting cable for drilling charges to get a seismic reading. just about dusk we saw a hugh dark boomerang flying very slowly at tree top height, it was silent  
and going so slow we could run as fast as it was going. but we didn't.
it had a red blinking light on the one wing we could see. we lost sight of it behind the trees. it was a clear, warm summer night, about 7:30 pm.
content.summary: We were in the woods sw of monroe working a sisemic survey crew, when at dusk a hugh, dark, boomerang shaped craft flew over us

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i was leaving turner to go back home,when i saw a nice house with x-mass lights and wanted a video of it. when i started to record the house lights to the far left of of the video. i notice lights on ground that i could not see with the naked eye.I asked my friend if he could see the lights on the ground with his eyes he said no only the house at far left.At about 5 min and 25sec into recording of the house and lights on the ground, my friend said to me hey look at that thing on the mountain it's huge dude. ufo come into view of my cam as i had it resting on the window car door.It was amazing sight to see on x-mass night.The ufo blink out after a sec or 2 after seeing it.
content.summary: I was recording x-mass house lights that looked really nice

content.detailedDescription:
I was told to give my most recent sighting above which i did 
my sightings are from my past and unfortunately i have no photos to give, i’ve been wanting to report my experiences for the past so many years but just never did, but do to recent events in my life (not associated with ufos) and inspired by the show hangar 1, i thought it’s time for me to sit down type this out and send it. now i have had many sightings over the years i use to smoke and spent a lot of time outside star gazing, since i’ve quit smoking i haven’t had any because i’m not outside as much looking up.

my first experience that i remember was back in 1988 late fall early winter time during the evening around 7 or 8pm, i was 17 years old and i was a passenger in a friend’s car on our way from harrisonburg va to charlottesville va, we were on highway 33 going over the mountains when we both noticed a large v shaped object hovering low directly over the  median strip between the roads, both of us looked at it but neither of us said anything until we were a few miles past when i finally said “what the hell was that anyway” but then we quickly dismissed it and went about our business. 

now it was not long after that event that i started experiencing what i would later come to find was called sleep paralysis were my mind was awake and fully aware but my body was asleep almost paralyzed feeling and i would struggle to try to move and if i could just as much as flick my finger then i would wake up from it! during these episodes i never heard anything unusual but there was a feeling of not being alone, this would happen randomly through the years sometimes once a month other times nightly for a period of time, every time i would awake from it though and see nothing i would be in my bed, lights out room dark nothing unusual. during the years as this went on i lived in virginia then back to indiana then virginia again down in florida for some years and then finely back in indiana 
now as i said i came to find that what i was experiencing was called sleep paralysis based on tv shows where it was talked about and was describe as a nature occurrence just as i decried it to be so therefor i never associated it with any type of alien abduction experience.   

then i’m going to say around 2007 or so when i was 36 one night as i had over the years had a another occurrence of sleep paralysis except this time it was completely different this time i could hear for a moment what sounded like hollowing wind and then it was quiet and as usual i struggled to wake from it but this time when i opened my eyes i was not in my room or bed instead i was in a well lit room with a being standing over me just looking directly at me! and all i remember thinking was wow you look a lot like the artist rendering i’ve seen over the year not quite but almost! nothing that i remember was said i just saw what i saw then my eyes closed then when i was able to open them again i was back in my room in my bed!  but what i had just experienced felt and seemed to be more than just a dream, if it was just a dream then it was the most realistic dream i could ever imagine having…one thing that did make me wonder though was the fact that when i did open my eyes and i was in such a well lit room the light did not hurt my eyes in any way that was the only thing that made me feel that it must have been some kind of dream…

now even though as i said that there were no words spoken, no conversation of any kind i was left with this feeling that i was allowed to open my eyes and see what i saw because this was my last time, they were done with me! and ever since then i have had no more sleep paralysis episodes at all, eight years now!  had them regularly for almost twenty years now nothing for the past eight.

now also on top of all this over the past so many years since my first sighting i have had at least eight other ufo sightings one involved what i would consider to have been a large mother ship followed by many smaller ships. that one took place here in indiana once again eight or nine years ago during the summer on a night when we were having a meteor shower and was witnessed be me and four other people.
content.summary: In this particular event we observed it through a telescope and it appeared to be three orbs circling one another changing in colors

content.detailedDescription: Driving on the high way between vt and ma i saw and object hovering over i took a quick video and pictures and then it disappeared
content.summary: Saw an object hovering over my car on the highway took videos n pics

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out from screen shots sent to mufon hq and by phone, at mufon hq., by field investigator l. flechtner, on 1/5/2016
-------------------------------------------------------------------- 

i was traveling on rt 159 heading to chilicothe oh to pick up a load heading out for a night run to chicago for an early am delivery. knowing  there was a severe storm warning for the night i was watching the skies as i traveled. there was a magnificent light show happening to the south over the city of chilicothe and i remember thinking to myself, boy, i'm going to be running in this all night. as i went through the town of tarlton in rt to chilicothe i noticed flashing lights over my rig not big or bright, but rather more like small twinkling lights
i have video but can't load it on report.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple objects flying in and out of a black thunder storm

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from chateauguay qc,on highway 138 as you approach my hometownof kahnawake quebec just before you enter it up above was a huge yellow glowing pyramid shape just hovering up above. it was higher than any street lights and higher than the trees near by.I was with my younger children so i just grabbed my cellphone and without looking i just started filming the sky i put my phone down since i was driving. the object just disappeared.I have around 40.Seconds of video i freeze framed it and you can see something in the sky.I was thinking to myself no way i get to see another ufo and in the same area. in the 90's around 1997 /98 i had seen a cigar shape ufo in that exact area. it had lots of different colors lights on it and went side to side then just took off, disappeared. with rhe ufo i seen last night i never seen anything like it before and it had no sound to it and no flight paddern to it. no blinking lights on it. it was not a plane nor a helicopter. i kept looking up when i could and it was just gone completely gone out of air space if it was a helicopter or a plane it would of still been in sight in the distance somewhere.
content.summary: Yellowish glowing triangle shape like a huge pyramid hovering up above,  then just disappeared. in the same area other sightings have been seen. also in the 90's the same area i seen a cigar shape ufo with lots of different colors on it.

content.detailedDescription: It was new years eve dec31 2015 i was in my room watching tv i got up to look out the window on the second floor facing the backyard i was looking for the guys that also live here i opened the window and all i could see was four bright orange lights in the sky flying in a straight horizontal formation with four. others following behind in pairs of two without any sound. flying slowly under cloud coverage. it was overcast that night i. knew what i was seeing without any doubt in my mine ufos. i ran downstairs and out the back door into the backyard looked up it was unreal all those bright lights just flying by.Slowly the color orange was very bright and. big i than ran back in the house and out the front door where the guys were and we watched. it go by at this point i went back inside and out the back door and two more sets of two flew by total of twelve. large orange lights.I could not see them any more as they passed the house they vanished into the cloud coverage  the time this happened was 1150 to 1158. .  it turned 1200 and a lot of noise celebrations started. for the new year. i was in total shock over what i had just seen.
content.summary: Twelve orange lights flying without sound. four in a straight.                                                                                                                                            others following behind in pairs of two.Flying slowly

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside at a neighbors fire pit. just hanging out. hubby saw it first, so 3 of us looked up. we all thought it was a chinese lantern or an ember from the fire. but then it just stayed in place for a bit. as we watched it, it flew in a straight line to the south, moving kinda fast. then it hovered, blinked a few times and disappeared. never made a sound. it was too low in the sky to be moving as fast as it was. plus, there was no wind. we just watched it go by in disbelief.
content.summary: Thought it was chinese lantern or embers at first. flew silent opposite normal wind direction. disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: In my neighborhood evening sky with large fluffy clouds looking south down interstate 77 i saw a hovering object. the object appeared stationary with a wide bank of red lights located east of the interstate at an altitude of at least 1,000 feet. not in traditional flight path of airports. it was stationary for at least 1 to 2 minutes appearing to change directions twice. while observing i did not see any other running lights but 3 to 4 large red rectangular running lights. no white or green lights observed, so it struck me odd because of no other colored lights. my location is located near both charlotte and concord airports with frequent helicopters flight paths seen in the general location of observed ufo. observed object did not appear to be a helicopter it seemed too large...I have attached a digital photo taken with camera phone.
content.summary: A bank of at least 3 to 4 red lights which hovered then changed directions twice.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were walking down manitou rd. from rte. 9d at about midnight when the sky lit up enough for us both to turn around, about as bright as if lightning was somewhere. there, about 3/4 of a mile south of us, was a glowing, white disk in the sky. a moment later, the disk traveled toward us so fast we didn't see it move. it stopped in place closer to where we are without making a sound, and after a few moments, it descended and we saw it fly away, just above the trees toward the east near south mountain pass. the whole event was so fast, there was no time to think about what the object was until it had gone. we were both frightened by it, because of its apparent mastery of time and space and we considered an extraterrestrial origin likely because of the same.
content.summary: Friend and i both saw a glowing, white disk travel 3/4s of a mile north instantly, stop on a dime, and after a few moments, decsend and fly toward the east.

content.detailedDescription: A stranger gave me this photo. my first thought was the virgin
content.summary: 1994 fr. gobbis cenacle mass at paolo soleri amphitheater in santa fe nm

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home when i went to the backyard to take a photo of the overnight snow fall that ended at around 8:00 am.  after downloading the photo to the computer i notice the object in the top center of the photo.  i thought that it might have been a water drop but there was no moisture on the camera and the temperature was twenty-five degrees celsius outside.

i showed the photo to a coworker that follows ufo sighting and he asked me to submit it to mufon.  i have no idea what the object is.
content.summary: Took a photo of the overnight show fall.  downloaded to computer and noticed the object.

content.detailedDescription: This is a refiling of what i saw sveral years ago. my original filing was not accepted b/c the site wasn't taking new ufo reports at that time. my first report was very long and detailed. now years later, i wish to refile my sighting simply b/c i can not stop thinking about what i saw that morning. quickly, i was working as an inventory manager for usata tmde near letterkenny army depot outside of chambersburg pa. i was the first at our duty station as usual that morning 0445. since most gov't operations run on coffee, that was what i did first, plug in the pot to preheat it. there is a small window near that area facing east and it was at that time i noticed a light to the ne. maybe not unusual since harrisburg international airport is in that general direction. it takes 6 minutes for the coffe pot to heat up enough to brew coffee. so i went to my office to check email etc. after about 6 minutes, i returned to the break area to make coffee. while the coffee was brewing to noticed the light i saw earlier appeared to have moved maybe a click or two toward what to me looked due west. takes about 2 minutes for the pot to fill and i grabbed a cup and walked outside smoking area to get a better look at the lights. i could tell it was moving but very slow and slow to the ground but still maybe 25 km (clicks)out. i watched it for maybe 25-30 minutes before i started to get a little freaked out by what i was seeing. it was coming slowly toward our bldg low in the sky and absolutely no sound. the 3 lights flashed off and on in no order and in no change of bightness. at that point, i decide i go get my camera from my truck hoping to get some pictures. the thing just kept coming low and slow. hoping to get a good prespective of size, i took the first picture as it past next to the bldg 50yds to due north. as it flew over that bldg, maybe 1-2 clicks out it sped up 2x climb and banked sharply to the north. it then leveled off maybe 2-3x the original height slowed down and continued to fly back in a general north to north east path. the whole sighting was over 45 moinutes in duration. i did pull the sd card from the camera but sadly the camera is a piece of junk and the pictures were not clear at all.I have been around a lot of aircraft. i have worked on patriot and hawk ada systems, and have held a high security level access. honestly this "thing" does not fit any known aircraft in my opinion.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Unusal object low in the sky and traveling very slow

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back deck, smoking a cigarette watching a high altitude plane, kind of wondering where they were going. i noticed how brilliantly clear it was and found orion and started star gazing. then i noticed to my left (east) how it seemed as though the stars were blinking out, almost like something was passing between my line of sight, then noticed, for lack of a better word, a "flash"; almost like a mirror catching moonlight..And thought "hey, it's the space station"..Best way to make sure you found the space station is too look a little ahead of where you thought you saw it because it moves so dang fast...Then...I just don't know how to describe what i saw. the best way i can describe it is like looking at something that is hiding from you and you catch that perfect angle and it's revealed, almost like it was cloaked..This massive ship, that's what it had to be. i've never in my life seen such a thing. it was almost boomerang shaped, but not such a harsh bend, if that makes sense. there were no external lights, it was the color of dirt almost just brownish, with these black, i don't know, maybe exhaust vents? that were oblong, i can recall seeing about five of these black..Things..And the entire ship, the whole of it, looked textured some how. i don't know. you know how you see a plane in the air and you can make out the metal is smooth, this was far from smooth. it was so high in the air, how could i even tell that it was textured? with no lights how could i tell it was brown .. it's not like it was flaming red or flashing lights .. it was dull and massive and almost seemed like it was creating a haze of some sort. not one sound came from it. even high altitude planes you can hear the hum as it passes, there was nothing coming from this thing. i lived on biggs army airfield for four years, as a refueling station for all us military forces that have pilots, i have seen a lot of what the us military has to offer, from a dc10 to a stealth (which are quite noisey unlike most people think), a blackhawk to a few prototypes that came out of nv to refuel .. i have never in my life seen anything like this. the silence of it, the size and the fact that i do believe it was "cloaking" and i some how just caught that perfect angle. may sound crazy, but i have never seen something so intentionally try to hide. my mind is blown. i want to know what i saw. how could it do these things?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have long been a skeptic until last night, i need to rethink my stance on "we are alone in the universe"

content.detailedDescription:
I had just been dropped off a pre-christmasparty and was on my way home and i had begun walking. i had reached the backside (southside) of trainstation and i noticed a bright spot just below the clouds. i could not make out what it was since i had several drinks, and that i am near-sighted made it a bit worse, but it was too bright not to notice.

it was quite windy that night so i thought it was peculiar that it stood still against the wind. i first thought it was a drone but then i realized that it did not have any directional lights and it was way too windy. i pulled out my phone to record it and it then started to move quite fast against the wind. (the wind was coming from south, and was about 7 meters per second (data from local weather-website)). the object was almost bird shaped when you see it front-to-back but the "wings" were much more prominent parabolic, in which i have never seen in a bird. also, it was just under the clouds, maybe just a couple of meters.

it began to move straight over me as i was filming northwards for then to turn right and towards west, i also then noticed another light coming from west going straight east in a very fast manner. i lost the first light as it went over a building and started to record the other light.

i then lost the second one, stopped recording, stayed for a couple of minutes but nothing else happened and i went home.

the next day i copied the video to my computer to see the footage in better detail and i think it might have been three objects.

i also tried to enhance the video in an editing software called davinci resolve, by increasing brightness and contrast, and also put it through stabilization.

the more i look at the footage the more convinced i am that it was a bird. still i can´t seem to shake off that feeling that it was so bright and moving so fast against the wind.

both the original footage and the "enhanced" footage is included in this report.


coordinates from where i was filming was approximately:
latitude: 59.910379 | longitude: 10.750629
and an estimate to the location from the object was:
latitude: 59.910852 | longitude: 10.750417 (the first one)
latitude: 59.910417 | longitude: 10.749089 (the second one)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2-3 bright hovering objects

content.detailedDescription: I was in a parking lot in north costa mesa ca by the north west side of the 55 free way and the 405 free way,and was relieving another security guard. the guard showed me very large lights that were blue/white slightly pulsating on the horizon in a cloud. the object looked to be over a a mile in size. it was hovering to the north of where we were and was over santa ana ca. the object was concealing itself in a cloud. you could see a slight outline of a saucer shaped object and counted 16 lights coming from the side / bottom of the craft like huge porthole windows. it looked to be about 3 miles away and over 1 mile in size. there were periodic flashes like a camera flash every minute or so as it hovered for about 30 minutes. 2 other co-workers came to see it also and we did not report it to our company or superiors. the reactions from every one was they weren't sure they wanted to believe what they were seeing but were excited and cursing due to the size of the object.The feelings were ominous. nervous, excited but very apprehensive due to the shear size of the craft. a co-worker attempted to take a cell phone video of it however it did not come out clear enough to see. the object just faded away in the clouds after about 30 minutes.
content.summary: 16 large blue/white large porthole lights in a cloud over santa ana ca saucer shaped

content.detailedDescription: When i was apx 10 years old my mother and i left our home 3203 hinchey ave new waterford nova scotia for a walk heading east. it was warm outside it was night time apx 9pm. we had just stepped on to the sidewalk when intuition i guess made me look back over my shoulder apx 45 deg angle. for less then 1 second 1 saw a "mothership" i guess you would call it. it had 30 to 50 levels with windows. the windows coverings were opened differently on each window such as an apartment building would look at night. the window coverings were similar to airplane window coverings except there were 2 parts that should meet in the middle. 1 row of white lights near the top red and/ or blue light (s) on top and bottom. the craft itself was dark metallic similar to lead. it appeared to be hovering over my neighbour's house but may have been much farther away. i saw this "mothership" for a split second i did a " double take" and it was gone. no sound no wind. i told my mother immediately after seeing it and she just nonchalantly laughed and said don't tell to many people dear. i am also an experiencer of abduction. ( the aliens rejected me whole other story) it happened apx 20 years ago i have always had ridicule when i decided to tell those close to me. my husband my sister my best friend i don't think anyone really believes me. other than seeing this craft and being abducted which can be arguably me not remembering stuff properly (it's not) i also awoke to 10 to 20 circle indentations sized nickle to loonie apx 1 to 2 mm in depth in various parts of my body. i shoes them to my mother who took me to my aunt who is a nurse. she said she had never seen anything like this before they kept asking me if the indentations when painful or itchy but they were not, just a little numb to the touch. even if these memories were somehow fabricated in my brain (they were not) the circle burn - like marks are physical.
content.summary: Headin apx east up hinchey ave with my mother "intuituon" i guess make me look 45 deg over my sholder... i saw a very large space craft apx 30 to 50 levels with windows and lights
